channel.title: [Delta]How do i get knives to work?[Delta]
channel.description:
Well i just posted my help topic on how to get me to be able to hit monsters weilding the Knives. But now it just hits the monsters like if i were holding a scimitar, How do i get them to be thrown at the NPC's/player's?
Please help. :eek:
